text: Hmm yeah the slow loading forms are always an issue, not sure anything can be done
Yeah… I would even settle for a min-height style field for media queries on the form module

is there a way to change where the JS is loaded, it wouldn’t stop a layout shift, but if the
`<script data-hs-allowed="true" src="/_hcms/forms/v2.js"></script>`
Was loaded asychrously in the head instead of the footer it wouldn’t have to load an extra js file before loading the form
though saying that it is the first thing to load in my waterfall
Here’s to hoping the new forms will be better (I believe private beta at the moment, i’ve not had access yet)

I think coming along side this
<https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/HubSpot-Ideas/Multi-step-page-forms/idi-p/11536/page/5#comments>

Also this post on linkedin, not sure if the link actually works so sent a screenshot
<https://www.linkedin.com/posts/erik-stromness-25637524_next-best-HubSpot-update-ever-multistep-activity-7178426105723334656-pclF?utm_source=share&utm_medium=member_desktop|https://www.linkedin.com/posts/erik-stromness-25637524_next-best-HubSpot-update-ever-[…]105723334656-pclF?utm_source=share&utm_medium=member_desktop>
